name: VinaCapital Ventures
description: Seeded by VinaCapital Group, VinaCapital Ventures is a USD100 million Vietnam-focused venture capital platform focused on investing in and building world-class technology companies and incorporating them into a full digital ecosystem. Our mission is to support entrepreneurs with big ideas and to help them build companies that make a significant impact on the lives of people in Vietnam and beyond. We partner with entrepreneurs and empower them with capital, access to our extensive business network, and local know-how from our years of experience in Vietnam and Southeast Asia.
